titleStmt.title: A wise virgins lamp burning; or Gods sweet incomes of love to a gracious soul waiting for him Being the experiences of Mrs. Anne Venn, (daughter to Col. John Venn, & member of the Church of Christ at Fulham:) written by her own hand, and found in her closet after her death. Wherein is declared her exceeding frequent addresses to the throne of grace, and how speedily answered. Written for the comfort of such as mourn in Sion, and quickning of saints by her blessed example.
titleStmt.author: Venn, Anne.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for E. Cole, and are to be sold at the signe of the Printing-Press in Cornhil,

notesStmt.note: Text appears continuous despite pagination and register.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the signe of the Printing-Press in Cornhil
